DOC.brief_summary: This phase IIa ( proof concept ) study conduct multi-centre study within European Union ( EU ) . It conduct randomise , single blind , placebo- control , parallel group design positive control arm evaluate analgesic efficacy pre-emptive dos GW842166 follow dental surgery ( 3rd molar tooth extraction ) . GW842166 administer single pre-operative oral dose male female subject randomise take part one four possible treatment regimen . Pain assessment undertaken 10 hr period . Pharmacokinetic blood sample collect 48 hr period . Safety tolerability evaluate adverse event monitoring , cardiovascular assessment ( ECG vital sign ) clinical laboratory test ( haematology , clinical chemistry urinalysis ) .
DOC.brief_title: Dental Pain 3rd Molar Tooth Extraction GW842166
